section.para:
Follows http://davetron5000.github.com/scala-style/index.html
Imports order (should be lexicographically ordered): # SqualeDB (not qualified) as a block # Scala (FQN) # Java using first qualifier as a block discriminant (FQN) ie com.aa com.bb
java.cc
inline Function: # if several lines: values.filter(value=>false) #if multiple lines: values.filter { value => ... ... }
